text: Cheaper by the Dozen refers to two movies based on the book of the same name by Frank Bunker Gilbreth, Jr. and Ernestine Gilbreth Carey: * Cheaper by the Dozen (1950 movie), the 1950 original, starring Clifton Webb * Cheaper by the Dozen (2003 movie), a 2003 remake starring Steve Martin, Ashton Kutcher and Hilary Duff
title: Cheaper by the Dozen (movie)
